23.ara-name: كتاب الجهاد عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated As-Sa'ib bin Yazid: "When the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) arrived from Tabuk, the people went out to Thaniyyah Al-Wada' to meet him." As-Sa'ib said: "I went out with the people, and I was a boy." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي تَلَقِّي الْغَائِبِ إِذَا قَدِمَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Meeting The One Who Was Away When He Arrives
